Shine City Valley homes are impeccable statement of style and comfort. It had changed the luxury life of the people by owning homes in this project. Ultra modern designing and superior interior have made Shine Valley homes a pride of the owners. Valley is consisting of amenities like
SHINE CITY INFRA PROJECT PVT. LTD.
1/5, Fourth Floor, R-Square Complex, Vipul Khand, Gomtinagar, Lucknow - 226010
A 105 South city, PGI Road, Near Shaheed Path, Lucknow

Shine City presents its most dreamt projects for the Lucknowites. The projects opens mind for whole new kind of experience and comfort. Nature Valley is build with the mind setup to bring the lives of the people near to Mother Nature. The home interiors are designed to give the maximum eco friendly environment. Interiors as well as exteriors are kept as natural as possible. The recreation areas are surrounded by myriad natural beauty. The main attractions of the project are

* Rooms and Cottages 
 * Restaurant 
 * Swimming Pool 
 * Party Lawn / Garden 
 * Gymnasium 
 * Yoga Center 
 * Department Store

* Kids Arena and Board Games 
 * Boating 
 * Horse Riding 
 * Indoor Games 
 * Outdoor Games 
 * Dairy Farm

Location : Bhaunra Kola, Kisan Path, Lucknow 
Project Type : Plot, Residential and Farmhouse 
Price Type : Plot-351/- Sq Ft. and Farmhouse-251/- Sq Ft. 
Scheme Type : Plots and Farmhouse 
Payment Plan : 100% Down Payment Plan and EMI Plan

 * Solar Street Lights

Shine Valley project is integration of trustworthiness and happiness. 50% of the area is left for the lush green beauty which gives relief against pollution and provides a harmony to the environment. Huge balconies, ultra modern fittings, superior finish, park facing homes make Shine City Valley worth for Return on Investment. The beauty of the project is the ambience and amenities present at the Shine City Valley.

Shine city primary business is development of residential, commercial and retail properties. The Company has a unique business model with earnings arising from development Shine City offers you the opportunity to live life in a relaxed yet grand way. So while you sip on chai with your friends, or read a book while enjoying the scenery or simply take a walk with your loved once, we see to it that your home and its amenities are a perfect blend of comfort and style.

An eco friendly approach is kept to design the layout of the whole projects. Paradise Garden is a perfect place to settle with your loved one. A project with modern infrastructure yet connected to Mother Nature in deeper sense which provides peace of mind and soul to the lives of the people owning a home at Paradise Garden.

The most aspired project of the Shine City. Mountain Heaven is crafted by the professionals seeking to give new dimension to the lifestyle. The state of the art infrastructure is built-in to give quality to the comfort living. The homes are designed to settle the lives of people with peace and comfort. An eco friendly approach is kept to design the layout of the whole projects. Mountain Heaven is a perfect place to settle with your loved one. A project with modern infrastructure yet connected to Mother Nature in deeper sense which provides peace of mind and soul to the lives of the people owning a home at Mountain Heaven.

* Commercial Area 
* Hospital 
* Community Centre 
 * School 
* Swimming Pool 
* Multi-Speciality Gym

* Club

The cottage consists of: 
* Two double bedrooms, one with a small ensuite. 
* Fully fitted kitchen with gas stove, microwave and dishwasher. 
* Two sitting rooms – one with a wood- burning fireplace and sofa bed and one with a library and wood burning stove. There is an excellent range of books and children’s books available to enjoy. 
* Utility room with clothes washer, fridge and shower room. 
* Comfortable conservatory with dining table, sitting area, and soapstone wood burning stove. 

Guests have full use of: 
* An indoor heated swimming pool and shower room (available only in the summer). 
* Two ponds with seating areas. 
* Entertainment deck with large barbeque and eating area.
EMI PLAN - ₹ 650/SQFT. + ₹ 200/SQFT. ( LAND COST + DEVELOPMENT ).
BUY BACK PLAN - BUY @ 700 and BACK @ 1000 AFTER 18 MONTH.
FULL PAYMENT PLAN - ₹ 1200 PER SQFT.

Nature View project presents to you a blend of modern lifestyle amenities with Beauty of Mother Nature in beautiful Bhowali town of Nainital. Bhowali is well connected with main town of district like Almora, Bageshwar, and Haldwani. Bhowali is famous for its incredible Himalayan View. Nature View is a township covered with beautiful scenery of Bhowali which works as a harmonizer for your Mind and Soul. Project is covered with greenery which is natural and man untouched. The environment of Bhowali offers pollution free air to breathe-in and relaxed in the midst of Nainital valley. This residential project from Shine City offers peaceful atmosphere in the lap of Mother Nature for togetherness with your loved ones.
\nNature View, Shine City first project of Uttarakhand. First ever project of its kind for giving comfortable housing experience in Nainital Beautiful Countryside. Project is well versed with all basic amenities for day to-day activities like proper transportation system, clean water supply, power supply, even landscape all over the project area. ROI of the project is high. The project offer three range of Housing according to your spacing need for home- 1BHK, 2BHK and Studio Apartment.

* Double Bed With Mattress and Pillows In Bedroom \n* 4 Seater Sofa With Center Table In Living Room \n* One LED T.V. - 24" * 4 Seater Dinning Set * Semi Modular Kitchen * One 180 Ltrs. Fridge * Wooden Wardrobe In Bedroom * Fitting All Bathrooms and Fixtures * Geyser in Bathroom.

* Double Bed With Mattress and Pillows In Bedroom \n* 5 Seater Sofa With Center Table In Living Room \n* One LED T.V.-32" * 6 Seater Dinning Set * Semi Modular Kitchen * One 180 Ltrs. Fridge * Wooden Wardrobe In Bedrooms * All Bathrooms Fitting and Fixtures * Geyser In Bathroom

* Single Bed With Mattress and Pillows in Bedroom \n* 2 Seater Sofa With Center Table In Living Room \n* One LED T.V. - 24" * Semi Modular Kitchen * One 180 Ltrs Fridge * Wooden Wardrobe in Bedroom * All Bathrooms Fitting and Fixtures * Geyser in Bathroom
***Buyback offer is available*** \n***Coupon discount is not applicable***

Kutumb Kashiyana Project is the latest venture of Shine City and it is in Banaras, a city whose each drop of water is like a touchstone. Kutumb Kashiyana project is having beautiful belt of greenery around the whole project area which is the core element in all Shine City projects. The most advanced and latest construction technologies are used in building the housing scheme in Kutumb Kashiyana. \nKutumb Kashiyana Project is an exceptional offer for the house searcher who wants to settle down in a spiritual place like Banaras.

* Commercial Area 
* Hospital 
* Community Centre 
* School 
* Swimming Pool 
* Multi Speciality Gym 
* Yoga Centre 
* Club 
* Solar Street Lights

This project of Shine City is blissful experience of housing in the city. It is designed keeping in mind the pocket of the common man. These homes are a gift to the residents of Lucknow to have a home in their dream city at affordable rates. Solitaire City homes are worth living for as they are beautifully designed with scientific approach to bring out maximum out of limited investments.

Project Type : Residential Colony
Price Type : 801/- Sq Ft.
Scheme Type : Residential Plots
Payment Plan : 100% Down Payment Plan and EMI Plan

Xhevahire City is the township crafted with the concept to Go Greener. Greenery lush is more focused to give a calm and peaceful surrounding to the residents in the townships. Every home in the Xhevahire is surrounded by a green belt to make the environment cool and harmonized. The construction approach is also kept eco friendly in building the homes. Scientific methods are applied to the construction technology to yield more Returns on Investments.
